item.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, daughter of Caroline Kennedy, has died
item.description: Tatiana Schlossberg, the daughter of Caroline Kennedy, has died following a battle with acute myeloid leukemia.

item.title: 3 hikers found dead during search and rescue effort in California, authorities say
item.description: The recovery effort for the three deceased hikers is underway, the San Bernardino County Sheriff's Department said on Tuesday.

item.title: Patriots star charged with strangulation, assault
item.description: New England Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs is facing strangulation and assault charges, according to court records.

item.title: WATCH: Baby boom for California fire department
item.description: The Stockton Fire Department shared that staff members welcomed 22 babies in 2025.

item.title: WATCH: Firefighters' Christmas rescue of dog goes viral
item.description: Patrick Micula of the Goodyear Fire Department in Arizona discusses his crew's rescue of a dog trapped behind a cinder block wall.
